code: import{CREATE_FILTER}from'../actions/index';var defaultFilter={continent:'All',maxCases:-1,minCases:0,maxDeaths:-1,minDeaths:0};var filterReducer=function filterReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultFilter;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case CREATE_FILTER:return action.payload;default:return state;}};export default filterReducer;
